text:
GigWalk | San Francisco, CA | Onsite | Full Time

$110 - $145K + Equity

Gigwalk is hiring backend Python developers. I've been here around four months and am pretty happy.

We provide software that matches companies looking for short-term contractors with people willing to do those jobs.

We just switched to a new, much more profitable business model and are starting to see some pretty exciting hockey stick growth.

Some of the tools we use include: Python, Postgres, AWS, Mongo, ElasticSearch, NodeJS, NewRelic, GitHub, and Slack.

Email me at JesseAldridge@gmail.com if you want to know more.
